title: wine_Stark-Condé_2005_Unfined_and_Unfiltered_Cabernet_Sauvignon_(Stellenbosch)
text:
Unnamed: 0: 18973.
country: South Africa.
description: From small-batch, handcraft producer Stark-Condé, this unfiltered Cab offers personality and elegance. Berry, herbs, fennel and spice on the nose lead into a red that's extremely pretty in the mouth. Good integration of tannins and fruit, and a light minerality throughout give the wine a soft, balanced appeal. Though it will pair well with spiced meat and bolder dishes, the wine is great on its own..
designation: Unfined and Unfiltered.
points: 89.
price: 27.0.
province: Stellenbosch.
region_1: .
region_2: .
taster_name: Susan Kostrzewa.
taster_twitter_handle: @suskostrzewa.
